name: Climb The Wall 2
description:
Timmy is back, after months of training with the master hopper, he feels ready to face the ultimate challenge of climbing, an even higher wall full of traps that challenges the skills of anyone brave enough to even attempt the ascent.

He is ready, with new climbing techniques and a lot of legendary costumes that will provide him incredible powers

Features:
- Simple Arcade mechanics, tap left or right
- Get characters with incredible skills,
- More tha 30 characters!
- Unlock different walls
- Nice toon graphics.
